name: Magical Monster Land
description: Use your platforming skills to guide Buster on an adventure to uncover secrets, collect treasure, and defeat challenging bosses!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit Processor: Intelcore duo cpu 3ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space Additional Notes: Try the free demo first to check the performance on your system
